skillTree.localised_description: The wails of a Banshee can be lethal and strike terror into the hearts of any who hear them.
Whereby the power of death itself is used to hold back the physical world.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Together, swift flashes of iridescent light strike fourth and tear the enemy apart.

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: A drawn blade should not be put away until slaked in blood.
This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!
"Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"
Whether a targeted slice to the throat, or a precision stab to the heart, this one knows how to kill!
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
"I spy with my beady eyeâ€¦ something that needs to be killed."
Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife inâ€¦
The harder they hit, the more they commit, the easier it is to strike back.
"The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud â€“ these are the things that sustain me."
Never trap this one, when cornered they have nothing left to lose.
Did you feel that? It's as if the Winds themselves protest...

effects.description:
Enemy miscast base chance: +5%
	(enemy armies in province)

skillTree.localised_description: Their screams ring out for miles and sap the will of those unfortunate enough to be within earshot.

skillTree.localised_description: The memories of their sorcerous crimes in life drive them through a horrible existence in between realms.

skillTree.localised_description: The abject terror felt in the presence of a banshee saps the enemy's very essence.

skillTree.localised_description: Ringing ears, blurred vision - the end approaches...
Offensive winds seem to bend around this figure. Oddly enough, the enemy's legs feel similarly.
The ancient spirit moves with the swiftness needed to avoid the retribution of afterlife, striking fear into those who'd balk her speed.

skillTree.localised_description: The last thing they will hear is the keening of her tortured soul.

skillTree.localised_description: There is always another way.

Always watching.

skillTree.localised_description: Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

skillTree.localised_description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.
Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.
Entities with this attribute ignore the effects of enemy contact effects such as  Poison
Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "Glory in your dark majesty, my lord."
Vampires and their liche-servants are devious creatures; manipulative with many mortal servants in their thrall.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: "They will tremble, my lord, oh, they will fear!"

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Once forbidden knowledge is acquired, Necromancers and Vampires will jealously guard it from rivals' eyes.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.
Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Enemy battle reinforcement time: +10%
	(all units in army)
